yaml.title: Publications
yaml.description-meta: Information, pdfs, and social metrics of papers

markdown.markdown:
<!--Include academic icons or buttons-->

{{< include /files/includes/_academic.qmd >}}

<script async src="https://badge.dimensions.ai/badge.js" charset="utf-8"></script>


```{r setup}
source("_functions.R")
missing_dois = c("10.31234/osf.io/rfh63_v1")
pubs_ignore = "W4255871580|W4251435941|W4212930328|W3161562742|W4280624121|W4235325902|W3166337729|W4398133639|W4402350098|W4200202235|W3158511265|W3124003809"

papers = data.frame(citation = c("Fuchs, M., Boyd, Z. M., Schwarze, A., Cosme, D., Stanoi, O., Kang, Y., Kowatsch, T., von Wangenheim, F., Bassett, D. S., Ochsner, K., Lydon Staley, D. M., Falk, E. B., Mucha, P. J., Jovanova, M. (In revision) Predicting Individual Differences in Digital Alcohol Intervention Effectiveness Through Multimodal Data",
                                 "Okker-Edging, K., Porter, B., Liu, A., Noh, D. J., Lydic, K., Muzekari, B., Lewis, T., Torres-Grillo, O., Falk, E. B., Tan, A. S. L., Cosme, D. (Submitted) Youth Participatory Action Communication Research to Address Environmental Health and Climate Change: A Case Study Bridging Graduate and High School Classrooms")) %>%
  mutate(citation = as.list(citation),
         publication_date = c("2025-08-13", "2025-08-15"),
         doi = NA,
         url = NA,
         pdf_url = NA)

#pubs = fetch_pubs(id = id, missing_dois = missing_dois, pubs_ignore = pubs_ignore)
#saveRDS(pubs, "pubs.RDS")
pubs = readRDS("pubs.RDS")
```

```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, type == "preprint" & !doi %in% c("10.31234/osf.io/bj857_v2", "10.31234/osf.io/86n3b")) %>% 
                select(citation, publication_date, doi, url, pdf_url) %>%
                bind_rows(papers),
              type = "preprint")
```

## Published journal articles
### 2025
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, grepl("^2025", publication_date))) 
```

### 2023
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, grepl("^2023", publication_date))) 
```

### 2022
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, grepl("^2022", publication_date))) 
```

### 2021
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, grepl("^2021", publication_date))) 
```

### 2020
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, grepl("^2020", publication_date) & !type == "dissertation")) 
```

### 2019
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, grepl("^2019", publication_date))) 
```

### 2018
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, grepl("^2018", publication_date))) 
```

### 2015
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, grepl("^2015", publication_date))) 
```

## Dissertation
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, type == "dissertation")) 
```

```{r setup}
source("_functions.R")
```

## Preprints & submitted 
```{r}
make_pub_list(filter(pubs, type == "preprint" & !doi %in% c("10.31234/osf.io/bj857_v2", "10.31234/osf.io/86n3b")) %>% 
                select(citation, publication_date, doi, url, pdf_url) %>%
                bind_rows(papers),
              type = "preprint")
```
